docs.text: if you're the type of person who goes on the submarine ride every time you visit disneyland , you're going to love the hunt for red october .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you'll also love the film if you enjoy cat and mouse military tactics , or if you're a sean connery or alec baldwin fan , or if you admired director john mctiernan's earlier films , die hard and predator .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in fact , the only people likely to be disappointed with the hunt for red october are those who have read the book , since films almost never live up to the novels which inspired them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the hunt for red october is an epic thriller , adapted from tom clancy's best selling novel .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: set in an era before glasnost , the movie revolves around a top-secret soviet submarine , called the red october .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the nuclear sub has a revolutionary propulsion system , which makes the vessel silent and allows it to escape sonar detection .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the red october embarks on its maiden voyage under the command of captain marko ramius , played by sean connery .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ramius has strict orders just to test the submarine , but he has other ideas .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he takes the sub and its crew and disappears into the atlantic ocean .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: is he planning to start world war iii ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cia analyst jack ryan doesn't think so ; he's convinced that ramius plans to defect to the u . s . ryan , played by alec baldwin , is given three days to prove his theory and find the missing sub .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the characters in the hunt for red october are paper thin , but the performances , thankfully , are rock solid .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: baldwin and connery anchor the film with their customary vigor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sam neil gives a sturdy performance as connery's somber first officer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's ironic to see neil and connery playing russians , since they are both best known for their roles as british agents , connery as james bond and neil as reilly , " ace of spies . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the large cast also includes scott glenn , james earl jones , tim curry , and joss ackland , plus richard jordan as the smooth u . s . national security adviser .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the special effects are remarkable , but more than anything , the hunt for red october is distinguished by its water-tight plot .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: screenwriters larry ferguson and donald stewart have gracefully navigated red october through a story line full of twists and turns .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they keep us involved in the action by unveiling plot strands at just the right moment .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie doesn't get as sweaty or breathless as die hard , because it would rather tell a good story than hit you over the head with non-stop action .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the finale is rousing and suspenseful , but essentially , the hunt for red october is a superior potboiler .
docs.label: positive
